body: @JooHyukKim this might be something for you, wrt date/time ser/deser. Basically: although `java.time.Month` is an Enum, it might be better not to rely on out-of-the-box `Enum[De]Serializer` due to 1-based nature of Month values.

Thanksss, I will look into this!
WIP on serializer
